text.name: Is it You?!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP on self

text.name: Is it You?!
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP on self

text.name: Is it You?!
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP on self
- At max SP, gain Clash Power +1 instead

text.name: Payback with Interest
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 3) Offense Level (max 2, rounded down)
coinDescs: At 4+ Reson. that includes this Skill, deal +10% damage

text.name: Payback with Interest
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
coinDescs: At 4+ Reson. that includes this Skill, deal +15% damage

text.name: Payback with Interest
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
- If the said Reson. includes an A-Reson., double the Offense Level gained from the above effect
coinDescs: At 3+ Reson. that includes this Skill, deal +20% damage

text.name: Write 'em all down
text.desc:
Deal +1% damage for every 2 [VengeanceBookSinclair] (max 15%)
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
coinDescs: Deal +2.5% damage for every Reson. that includes this Skill (max 15%)

text.name: Write 'em all down
text.desc:
Deal +1% damage for every 1 [VengeanceBookSinclair] (max 30%)
Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
- If the said Reson. includes an A-Reson., double the Offense Level gained from the above effect
coinDescs: Deal +5% damage for every Reson. that includes this Skill (max 30%)

text.name: Warmup in the East
text.desc: [StartBattle] Gain 20% of missing HP as Shield (once per turn)

text.name: Warmup in the East
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Skill behavior changes based on the sum of Envy A-Reson.:
- At 4+ sum of A-Reson., use 'Payback with Interest' as Counter
- At 6+ sum of A-Reson., use 'Write 'em all down' as Counter
(Activates from the leftmost Skill Slot. Activates 2 times per turn)
[StartBattle] Gain 30% of missing HP as Shield (once per turn)

1101201.name: The Middle Never Forgets
1101201.desc:
When hit by an enemy, inflict 3 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn)

When an other ally is hit by an enemy, inflict 2 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn per Identity)

After Attacking with Base Attack Skills or Counter Skills, consume all [VendettaMark] on the target
- Every time the target consumes [VendettaMark], gain [VengeanceBookSinclair] equal to the amount consumed

1101211.name: The Middle Never Forgets
1101211.desc:
When hit by an enemy, inflict 5 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn)

When an other ally is hit by an enemy, inflict 2 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn per Identity)
- If the said ally is from the Middle, inflict 3 additional [VendettaMark]

After Attacking with Base Attack Skills or Counter Skills, consume all [VendettaMark] on the target
- Every time the target consumes [VendettaMark], gain [VengeanceBookSinclair] equal to the amount consumed

1101221.name: We've Got Your Back
1101221.desc: Combat Start: 1 ally with the least current HP percentage gains 2 [DefenseUp]

1101231.name: We've Got Your Back
1101231.desc:
Combat Start: 1 ally with the least current HP percentage gains 2 [DefenseUp]
- If the said ally is from the Middle, also gain 2 [AttackUp]

main: When his passive is active, enemies that attack him or other Middle identities gain 5 {status:VendettaMark} and enemies that attack other allies gain 2.

{status:VendettaMark} increases damage taken from Middle identities and applies {status:RetaliationBookFamily} on the enemy with the highest stack, triggering other Middle identity {status:RetaliationBook} effects on them.

Attacking enemies consumes their {status:VendettaMark} to gain {status:VengeanceBookSinclair}, increasing his damage based on the stack and giving him 1 speed and {status:ResultEnhancement} at 20+ stacks.
His counter turns into his S2 at 4+ A-Reson or his S3 at 6+ A-Reson.
other: Gains {status:Aggro} on his S1 and S2.
S2 and S3 gain {status:AttackUp} based on Reson, double with A-Reson.
